testcase.brief: (IxPort: CoF=1)Check default agetime for dynamic learnt mac entry
testcase.description:
Topology to use Router++++switch+++++IXIA port Description Check default agetime for dynamic learnt mac entry Platform Dependence Chesapeake Pre-condition ? IXIA connect to switch port g/1/1 Test procedure 1. IXIA send a packet to switch, the source mac is 0000-1111-1111 2. Check the FDB table mac entry for 0000-1111-1111 Result1 3. Check the default age time Result2 4. IXIA don’t send any traffic to switch with this mac 5. Check if the mac entry delete after the default age time out Result3
Expect result Result1: FDB table has mac entries : [0000-1111-1111, vlan10, g/1/1] Result2: the default age time is 300 seconds Result3: the mac entry will deleted after 300-600 seconds

step.desc: configure 3 access ports in the same vlan
step.telnet: -v "vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "vlan ${tb.vlan2}" -v "interface ${sw1.port1} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface ${sw1.port2} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface ${sw1.port3} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan2}" -v "show vlan brief" -v "show vlan summary" -v "show vlan id ${tb.vlan1}" -v "show vlan id ${tb.vlan2}" -v "show mac-address-table all" -v "show interface"

step.desc: build stream, port1 sends broadcast frame with src-mac ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac}
check FDB, mac learned by FDB
check default agetime of each entry
check the 8k FDB entries is not ageout before 300sec
check the mac ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac} will age timeout
